original: shr'i dzi ya sunda ri s'a dha nam /
analyzed: shr'i dzi ya sunda ri s'a dha nam /

original: dpal rgyal ba'i mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: dpal rgyal ba'i mdzes ma'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining the Glorious Jayasundarī

original: aom shr'i dzi ya sunda ri h'um /
analyzed: aom shr'i dzi ya sunda ri h'um /

original: zhes so // chu klung gnyis phrad pa'i sar tsandan gyi mandala byas te /
analyzed: zhes so // chu klung gnyis phrad pa'i sar tsandan gyi mandala byas te /
translated: At a place where two rivers meet, make a maṇḍala of sandalwood.

original: mchod pa dang gtor ma dang zan dang zho phul nas /
analyzed: mchod pa dang gtor ma dang zan dang zho phul nas /
translated: Offer worship, a bali, food, and yogurt.

original: zhag bdun du nyi ma re la stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas pas /
analyzed: zhag bdun du nyi ma re la stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas pas /
translated: Recite eight thousand times each day for seven days.

original: zhag bdun gyi nub mo rgyan dang bcas nges par 'ong ngo //
analyzed: zhag bdun gyi nub mo rgyan dang bcas nges par 'ong ngo //
translated: On the evening of the seventh day, she will definitely come with ornaments.

original: byung ba dang chu'i mchod yon dbul lo //
analyzed: byung ba dang chu'i mchod yon dbul lo //
translated: When she arrives, offer her water for welcoming.

original: de dgyes nas bu bdag gis ci bgyi zhes zer na bdag nyid rgyal por gyis shig ces brjod do //
analyzed: de dgyes nas bu bdag gis ci bgyi zhes zer na bdag nyid rgyal por gyis shig ces brjod do //
translated: If she is pleased and says, “Son, what can I do for you?” say, “Make me a king.”

original: des rgyal po dang gos dang rgyan dang zas la sogs pa rnams ster bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des rgyal po dang gos dang rgyan dang zas la sogs pa rnams ster bar 'gyur ro //
translated: She will give you a kingdom, clothes, ornaments, food, and so forth.

original: dpal rgyal ba'i mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpal rgyal ba'i mdzes ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The Means of Attaining the Glorious Jayasundarī is complete.
